Food.main-slogan: For those who care about their body, health, and time.
Food.auth-to-order: To order a personalized meal plan, you need to log in
Food.section-slogan: Taking care of yourself is taking care of the future
Food.question-header: What issues will the meal plan solve for you?
Food.step1: You purchase a personalized meal plan.
Food.step2: You receive an email with a questionnaire, which you fill out and send back to us.
Food.step3: We create the meal plan and send it to your email.
Food.step4: You eat healthily and deliciously with pleasure.
Food.tile-weight-desc: If you want to adjust your body shape.
Food.tile-strong-desc: Planning to gain muscle mass? We will help you!
Food.tile-skin-desc: If you notice visible skin issues on your face.
Food.tile-vitamin-desc: If your body lacks vitamins and micronutrients.
Food.tile-energy-desc: Do you feel like you lack energy even for basic activities?
Food.tile-food-desc: Emotional dependence on food. When it's hard to resist eating something tasty.

MainPage.main-desc: We are glad that you have chosen us on your journey to a healthier and more active life. Here you will find everything you need to achieve your goals.
